name: SWIFT-ATE-Syntax
description:
Proper SWIFT (http://www.swift.com) ATE files highlighting.

This syntax complies to FIN release 2006.
install_details:
1. copy downloaded file to your syntax directory
2. add the following lines to your filetype.vim file :
	" ATE SWIFT Message
	au BufNewFile,BufRead *.ate			setf ate
